name: PhD Synergy-ISO-7 2kg
description:
One product offering the benefits of numerous separate ingredients

Added 5-Methyl-7-Methoxy-Iso Flavone for maximum protein absorption

Added zinc oxide, magnesium oxide, vitamin B6 for improved hormonal balance

High in BCAA's and Leucine

Improves energy, vitality, muscle growth and repair

How often does choosing the correct supplements leave you utterly confused, frustrated and with empty pockets? We’ve all made incorrect supplement choices, choosing supplements that we don’t need, won’t help us achieve our goal and are simply far too over-priced.

 We’ve all fallen for the over-priced US products, promising huge gains within miraculous time scales, you are not alone in believing in miracles, the product designers at PhD have all been there in years gone by, we’re athletes the same as you, all seeking nutritional and supplementation synergy.. 

There have been attempts at providing “everything under one-roof” in a sports supplement before, so to speak, but none have been designed with total nutritional synergy. Until now! Synergy-ISO-7™ is the answer to the all-in-one conundrum, it’s also an answer to the prayers of those seeking nutritional synergy, essentially it’s a premium product designed to maximize the various needs of all modern-day athletes.

Strength and Mass gains

Methyl-T3 strength stack: Synergistic compounds designed to maximize production of anabolic hormones. 5-Methyl-7-Methoxy-Iso Flavone is the most potent, legal anabolic compound available.

When stacked with Zinc and magnesium it forms a powerful anabolic triple header. 

Muscle Volumising Matrix:

Pharmaceutical-grade standards of the most potent and research-driven cell-volumising amino-acids, designed to induce intra-muscular super-compensation, ensuring muscle fullness, maximum pump and strength re-generation. 

This matrix primes muscles for maximum volume during intense training ensuring extreme muscle pumps and recovery between heavy sets.

Recovery and muscle repair

Combining the finest 2 protein sources known to mankind (37 grams per serving and 74 grams per daily use of Whey protein Isolate and Whey Protein Concentrate), with naturally-high levels of vital and synergistic BCAA’s & Leucine. Leucine has been shown to significantly increase protein synthesis within athletes. 

In simple terms this equates to more useable and more instant protein to use for muscle growth and repair.

 Synergy-ISO-7™ also includes electrolytes, often lost during intense exercise and need to be re-stocked immediately upon conclusion. Synergy-ISO-7™ contains synergistic amounts of these vital electrolytes.

Energy and Vitality

Using a triple-action carbohydrate blend, the energy and vitality section within Synergy-ISO-7™ completes the synergistic blend within this premium product. Maltodextrin and Fructose contain relatively low-GI carbohydrates, whilst dextrose monohydrate ensures quick and efficient glycogen replenishment after exercise.


Nutritional profile: per 66.6G serving (Based on Double chocolate cookie flavour)


30 servings per container


Protein: 37G

Carbs: 17G

Sugar: 10G

Fats: 3.9G

Of which saturated: 1.75G

Fibre: 3.6G


Muscle Volumising matrix: 6.5 grams

Containing: Micronised Creatine Monohydrate, Micronised L-Glutamine, Micronised taurine


Methyl-T3-Strength-stack: 330mg

Containing: 5-Methyl-7-Methoxy-Isoflavone, Zinc Oxide, magnesium oxide, Vitamin B6.


Micronutrient blend: 707mg

Containing: Potassium, calcium, Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Phosphorus.


Recommended use: Use 2 servings of Synergy-ISO-7™ daily. Use 1 serving (2 level scoops) as the pre-exercise meal approximately 60-9- minutes prior to exercise. Use the second serving as either the post-workout meal or anytime during the day.


Recommended use: Use 2 servings of Synergy-ISO-7™ daily. Use 1 serving (2 level scoops) as the pre-exercise meal approximately 60-90 minutes prior to exercise. Use the second serving as either the post-workout meal or anytime during the day.

name: BSN NO-Xplode 1kg
description:
L-Arginine AKG and L-Citrulline AKG blend for effective bloodflow offering a wealth of oxgen and nutrient into the muscle during exercise and the removal of toxins from the muscle

Water soluble creatine for effective absortion, endurance and strength

Increased muscle cell volume and vascularity

Mental Focus

No blaoting, water retention or cramping

Amplify Mental Focus, Performance, Strength, & Training Intensity. NO-Xplode is the world's first and only pre-workout supplement that produces immediate results in energy, size, strength, pumps, performance, mental focus, and training intensity. You will literally see and feel it working within minutes of taking it! An excellent pre workout creatine product.

NO-Xplode has the unique ability to get you dialed in and pumped up for every single workout by inducing the strongest and most advanced nitric oxide, creatine, and body-mind stimulating surge ever developed in a supplement. No other products can say that! No other products can do that!

Immediate Muscle And Vascular Enlargement With NO Meta-Fusion!

name: BSN Cell Mass 800g
description:
Why buy Cell Mass?

Uses the latest Ethyl Ester technology

No loading

No bloating

Only lean muscle tissue gain

Improved strength/power

Enhanced recovery and ATP production

SIZE, STRENGTH AND HARDNESS HAVE A NEW NAME...

A new breed of Esterified Creatine has arrived! An Esterified Creatine unlike any other in existence. One so powerful and effective that it adds new meaning to mass, strength, muscularity, performance, and recovery. A product so perfect that it delivers unequaled new cell volumizing nutrients to every muscle in the body. Something so strong that it doesn't just penetrate the muscle cell door; but instead, kicks it down with unmatched amounts of muscle expanding creatine.

 A product so cutting-edge that it contains a new super-anabolic Glutamine innovation that promotes intense muscle hardening and rapid recovery.

 A formula so effective that it immediately triggers new levels in size and strength that will alter your body and performance from the very first dose. Prepare your body for CELLMASS... Redefining creatine as you know it!

CELLMASS contains the radical breakthrough CEM3™ (Creatine Ethyl Ester Malate). The newest "Mass Monster" in Esterified Creatine technology. Your body has never before felt the extreme muscle hardening effects of glutamine and the true mass inducing potential of creatine... until now!

NO LOADING, NO CYCLING, NO HARD TO SWALLOW TABLETS, NO SUGAR, NO STOMACH BLOAT, NO WATER RETENTION, NO UP AND DOWN OLD SCHOOL CREATINE WEIGHT GAIN.

name: BSN Syntha-6 1320g
description:
Why buy Syntha-6?

6 Extended Release Protein Blend is formulated with fast, medium and slow digesting proteins to sustain amino acid levels

Great for use through the day and before bed to optimise GH output during sleep

Added MCT's

Aspartame and stimulant free

Great for both weight management and muscle growth

Syntha 6 Extended Release Protein Blend is formulated with fast, medium and slow digesting proteins to sustain amino acid levels over a long interval, while increasing protein synthesis, and repairing damaged muscle tissue.

Its protein matrix consists of ultra-filtered whey protein concentrate, Micellar alpha and beta case-ins, micro-filtered WPI, egg albumen, calcium caseinate, and milk protein concentrate. It is low in carbs and lactose, making it a good choice for individuals seeking sustained protein delivery to promote optimal rates of protein synthesis without a lot of extra fat and carbohydrate calories.

name: Reflex Thermo Fusion 100 caps
description:
Why buy Thermo Fusion?

Formula designed around proven scientific studies relating to fat loss
Ephedrine free format
Increase metabolism
Increase energy levels
Increase fat use for energy

ThermoFusion sets a completely new benchmark in fat loss formulae. It’s guaranteed to be the most effective legal weight management formula available. ThermoFusion contains perfectly safe and scientifically proven ingredients to help you get the results you want faster when combined with an effective training and dietary regime.
